title: Targeted panel-oriented test for clonality and heterozygosity
text: TAPACLOTH tool classifies somatic mutation calls targeted-panel sequencing either subclonal, clonal heterozygous clonal LOH, thorugh statistical hypothesis test based Binomial Beta-Binomial modeling sequencing read count process. Additionally, TAPACLOTH can used infer sample purity. Since two processes independent, one can first estimate sample purity use input classification task.
